entry.title: Choe Han-gi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Choe Han-gi (pictured) published a theory that aimed to replace Newtonian mechanics with one based on qi?

entry.title: Global Plasma Solutions (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a class-action lawsuit against Global Plasma Solutions claimed that their air-purification devices used in schools did not function as advertised and were potentially harmful?

entry.title: Arthur Leslie Walter Newth (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Arthur Leslie Walter Newth was only 21 when appointed to command the 16th (Service) Battalion of the Cheshire Regiment during the First World War?

entry.title: To the Batmobile Let's Go (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Todd Terry's To the Batmobile Let's Go features the first track to sample Arthur Russell?

entry.title: Annas Maamun (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that when sworn in, Annas Maamun was the oldest serving Indonesian governor?

entry.title: GhostRider (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that GhostRider is the longest wooden roller coaster on the West Coast of the United States?

entry.title: 2000 Taiwanese presidential election (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the 2000 Taiwanese presidential election ended more than 50 years of Kuomintang rule?

entry.title: an online community (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that an online community makes its users pretend to be long-time neighbors as part of a fictional town named Lower Duck Pond?
